chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: The core widget plugin contains a set of widely used widgets in a Geomajas application, as well as some very popular map controllers and events. The current widget set contains:

listitem.para: LayerLegendPanel: a panel that shows the title/legend of a layer and some layer controls
MapLegendPanel: a container of LayerLegendPanel instance, one for each map layer

chapter.para: We also have the following map controllers/listeners:

listitem.para: FeatureClickedListener: a listeners that sends an FeatureClickedEvent when the user clicks on a feature
MouseOverListener: a listeners that that sends an FeatureMouseOverEvent when the user hovers over a feature
